DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : No Axis I Axis II diagnose . EXCLUSION CRITERIA FOR ALL SUBJECTS : If pregnancy test positive woman reason believe might pregnant , exclude study . Women breastfeed exclude study avoid unwarranted risk child . Subjects prior reaction iodine , iodine compound , shellfish exclude study . Subjects history thyroid disease dysfunction exclude study . Subjects history recent substance abuse exclude study . Subjects metal object body specify MRI protocol ( 91M0124 ) exclude study . If structural abnormality brain detect MRI , subject exclude study . EXCLUSION CRITERIA FOR NORMAL CONTROLS : Subjects Axis I Axis II disorder exclude . Subjects concomitant medical neurological disorder require ongoing medication , may affect central nervous system exclude .
